location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1796 from ... (illegible) , Acting Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying the approval of the Bombay Government over the Resident's proceedings with respect to his efforts to extend the prohibition of the slave trade in the Persian Gulf.
